How to add Navi+ to a separate page through Theme Session

There are several ways to add a Navi+ menu to your website, allowing you to customize and combine various Navi+ navigation tools to guide users towards your business goals. One way is to directly embed one or more Navi+ menus into your theme as a section, which you can do following the instructions below
